verses.roman:
ki kariyā beḍāya,--ihā keha nāhi jāne
mahāprabhura darśana pā ya kona bhāgyavāne

synonyms: ki kariyā—doing what; beḍāya—walks through; ihā—this; keha nāhi jāne—no one could understand; mahāprabhura darśana pāya—see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kona bhāgyavāne—some fortunate men.
translation: No one could understand what Nityānanda Prabhu was doing as He walked about. Some, however, who were very fortunate, could see that Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was also present.
